Greta then returns as an undead avenging angel, reaping revenge on the Ravensbrück family and her manically possessive brother.","poster_path":"/jMXaIDsW89wvDDswdZNqOvEQxHw.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[27],"popularity":8.562,"release_date":"1973-07-11","video":false,"vote_average":5.8,"vote_count":58},{"backdrop_path":"/m2xjEECVuVeG304kA4R2y7UJCvY.jpg","id":20017,"title":"Wrong Move","original_title":"Falsche Bewegung","overview":"Six days in the life of Wilhelm: a detached man without qualities.
